items.summary: Replace the Hero section avatar image with the user-uploaded profile photo by generating/placing it as a static asset at `frontend/public/assets/generated/vibhanshu-profile.dim_512x512.jpg`, keeping the existing Hero avatar `img` src pointing to `/assets/generated/vibhanshu-profile.dim_512x512.jpg`. Use the uploaded `cropped_circle_image.png` as the source input for this asset.
Update the Contact section Google Drive card text so it includes the word "Projects" in brackets, i.e., display "Google Drive (Projects)" for the Google Drive contact item.

Remove the footer line "© 2026. Built with ❤️ using caffeine.ai" and replace it with the following closing message (preserve the wording):
"Would love to connect and share my ideas and Vision about the data related work.
 Regards Vibhanshu"
